title: Handmade in Senegal
content:
Hello. Handmade by a painter in letter directly onto the body of a car in Senegal!  
And I need to redo the logo for the website and documents of the orphanage ...  
So a similar font is sufficient and if free would be greatly appreciated!  
Thank you in advance

Font: 

 Bayview JNL 

Solved By: 

 [donshottype](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317110048/http:/typophile.com/user/205259 "View user profile.")

| Attachment | Size |
| --- | --- |
| [cocon-logo.jpg](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317110048/http:/typophile.com/files/cocon-logo.jpg) | 66.91 KB |
author: hm38

comments.content:
Nothing free that I can find that is even in the ballpark. About as close as I can get is Jeff Levine's Bayview JNL [http://www.myfonts.com/fonts/jnlevine/bayview/](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317110048/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/jnlevine/bayview/ "http://www.myfonts.com/fonts/jnlevine/bayview/") based on the condensed version of Inland's typeface Studley from circa 1900. At US$25 it's not a budget breaker. It can be used as is for a rough approximation. But relatively minor editing can make it very close.  
Don

Thank you very much "donshottype" for the time spent on this research and sorry for not having thanked you before. I spent more time trying to find a similar typeface but nothing better than your proposal. Thank you again and have a good day.
